content.title: Game rules
content.content:
Start a Game

Names

You can choose name of players. If you left names empty, the names will be set with default values

Preferences

You can choose preferences. You should choose as many as possible preferences.

Localization

You can choose place of game

Time of Game

You can choose how many time you will have to finish current task.

Task per level

You can choose how many task you will have per level

During the game

After start, every player has 0 points and game has 3 levels. You choose who should start next task and you can random a player.

Next, selected player doing the task in selected period of time. You start a task.

If task is finished, second player selecting how task was done.
